channel.title: FSU R User Group
channel.description: Blog for the FSU R Group.

item.title: Friday, Feb 3, 2023
item.dc:creator: Russell Almond
item.description:
We will start our exploration of R for Data science with Chapter 3, Data Visualization.

For this to work, we need volunteers to try the exercises. You donâ€™t have to succeed, but you should get far enough to get stuck in an interesting place, which we can discuss.

Post your solutions

Post your solutions (or attempts) in Posit Cloud.

You can sign up for a free posit cloud account which allows us to share R code. Create your account at Posit.cloud, and then use the signup link to access our R group project space.

If you have a question, or want to volunteer to work on a problem, use the comment section below.

item.title: Plans for Spring 2023
item.dc:creator: Russell Almond
item.description:
The plan for 2023 is to do a self-study on the book

R for Data Science

which is available online.

Each session, volunteers will present on the exercises in the book, and we will discuss some of the ideas.

We will also check in with some other projects that people might be working on, workshopping problems they are having.

In particular, I will present some of my ongoing work with data analysis for Physics Playground.
